entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 early this morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 5 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
